about_the_game:
This is your chance to be the owner of Motel. Build, Renovate and expand your Motel empire. Clean the rooms and look after the needs of your guests like Food, Entertainment and Comfort. Expand your motel and renovate new rooms to open and increase your business. You have to repair broken stuff and buy new parts to repair.

Motel needs more then just rooms to expand the business and have happy customers. Create Dinner and hire chefs to server hot food with custom menu.
Player will also be able to open Gas Station on the opposite side of the road to earn more bucks and expand your motel into a amazing stop for all the travelers.

There are many different vehicles that will be visiting the motel and many unique characters with there own stories and characteristics.


Player will have to keep the motel area clean to have good rating and keep customers satisfied. There will be many activities that player have to do in order to keep the motel running properly. Like Fixing Electronics or windows and many small objects.
